entry.title: Introducing a POW through a soft-fork
entry.summary: The discussion revolves around the proposal of decreasing the block interval which would increase the orphan rates leading to security implications. However, the proposer argues that the total transaction rate and block size remain unchanged, so the orphan rate should not change. This argument is refuted by the fact that the expected time to find each type of block will be halved, resulting in the doubling of the orphan rate.
